chapter.text: Say: "I commit myself to Allah, the Creator and Master of mankind
Counter to the evil generated by the sneak whisperer and by his confederates, and by those with characteristics befitting Al-Shaytan (Satan) separately or combined
Who instigate evil in peoplesâ€™ repositories of consciousness and suggest it secretly to the thoughts and the feeling and to the religious mind
Of the people among the. Jinn and mankind
